task.title: Viewing the transfer configuration by using the command line
task.shortdesc: System administrators can view the automatic log transfer configuration details by using the show LogAutoTransfer command.

step.cmd: To view the automatic log transfer configuration details, enter the following command:

info.note: The command must be capitalized as shown.

taskbody.example: The following example shows the automatic log transfer configuration: show LogAutoTransfer Destination = ftp://192.0.2.10 Port = 21 UserID = user1 Enabled = True
